name: Trapped forever
description:
You were kidnapped in a weird big house beucse you did something. but what did you do?

Controlls:

Steer with W,A,S,D

Crouch with CTRL

Jump with SPACE

And run with SHIFT

Info:

All music is made by me in musescore3 and musescore4 except the cutscene/intro  and gameplay music ;)

And remember that this game is nott done yet.
